attributes.action: Make it illegal to harm any animal and those that do imprison them
attributes.additional_details: Evidence is in the pleas from owners for their animals to be found.  Media shows animal cruelty at it's worst. It's time to stop this and bring in harder laws
attributes.background:
More animals are going missing and stolen. More animals are suffering with so much cruelty being taken out on them.
Time to make proper laws to stop this and give a voice for those animals as they cannot speak for themselves

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the UK Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

Animal cruelty is already against the law. We don't know what further action you'd like the UK Government or Parliament to take. 

You might like to consider signing this petition:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/232131
